Question
========

Suppose the independent probability that three individuals *A*, *B* and *C* will be alive in 30 years are still alive is equal to 0.4, 0.3 and 0.5, respectively. Then what is the probability that in 30 years none of the three will be alive?

Answerlist
----------

* 0,06
* 0,21
* 0,12
* 0,1

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* 0.06: Incorrect
* 0.21: Correct
* 0.12: Incorrect
* 0.1: Incorrect
